data.name: Yougen
data.detailed_description:
Yougen is a game in which the main character, chosen as an emissary of God, clears various requests.

Various characters and stories

This is the story of the protagonist's soul wandering in this world after it meets the voice of God.

The story begins when the main character's soul, wandering in this world, encounters the voice of God. In the interstice between the afterlife and this world, the main character is given a mission.
By granting people's wishes, various dramas will be woven into the story.
As the story progresses, changes will occur in the Kakuryo no Hazama, the base of operations.

.

Action with a sense of urgency

In the beginning of the game, you will only be fighting in close quarters with your sword.
In the beginning, the game is only about close combat with swords, and we have eliminated the convenience of falling from heights and dying.
In the future, we plan to add skills, sorcery, and other features so you can enjoy a wider variety of action.

.

About the Future

.The game is currently only available as a trial version, but we are planning to add quests, online features, character enhancements, and other new features in the future.

data.short_description: Yougen is a Japanese-style 2D action game in which the main character, chosen as an emissary of God, touches the reason of the world while accomplishing the request.
